objects.text:
Delicate crochet detailing • Soft, breathable fabric • Versatile style
Perfect for warm weather • Available in sizes XS-XL

product_details.name: Sunshine Breeze Crochet Tank Top - Perfect Summer Essential
product_details.description:
• Delicate crochet detailing at neckline for feminine charm
• Soft, breathable fabric in a vibrant peach/orange shade
• Flowing empire waist design for comfortable fit
• Sleeveless style perfect for warm weather
• Versatile piece suitable for casual to semi-dressy occasions
• Easy-care fabric that maintains shape after washing
• Available in sizes XS-XL
• Lightweight and packable - ideal for travel
• Can be layered with cardigans or jackets for transitional weather
• Premium quality construction with reinforced stitching

banner_details:
This banner presents a stylish, summer-themed apparel promotion. It features a soft gradient background with peach and coral tones, creating a warm and inviting mood. Central to the design is an image of a model showcasing the product, placed over a faded concentric circle pattern that draws attention to the center. The main heading ("heading") is bold and uppercase in a deep plum color, followed by a subheading ("subheading") with a lighter serif typeface. Beneath the product image, there's a descriptive paragraph ("description") providing product details in a compact two-line layout. A large price tag ("price") is clearly displayed, and a rectangular “call-to-action” button ("cta_background" with text "cta") invites users to shop. The composition is symmetrical and informative, ideal for fashion e-commerce. 

**Color Palette:**
- Light Peach: #FFE8D6
- Coral: #FF9B71
- Deep Plum: #6D2E46
- Warm Rose: #FF8E6E
- Creamy Pink: #FFB89C
product_color: The image presents a visually appealing product with a soft and warm color palette ideal for an advertisement banner. Dominant colors include a vibrant **peach-orange (#FDAE5C)** dress that stands out against the model’s natural **sandy blonde hair (#D4B07B)**. The soft blending of her hair creates a gradient with low-lights in **light brown (#8A6D4F)** enhancing realism. The bold red lipstick (#9E1B32) contrasts dynamically with the softer tones, drawing attention to the face. The background is pure white (#FFFFFF), allowing the brighter hues to be highlighted effectively. Together, these colors deliver a golden, summery, and fresh aesthetic suitable for fashion and beauty promotions.
